sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { Card, Button, Container, Row, Col, Image, Dropdown, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; import axios from 'axios'; import products from '../product'; import './ProductPage.css'; export function ProductPage({ match, history }) { const pk = match.params.id; // const product = products[2]; const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/products/${pk}`) .then((response) => { setProduct(response.data) }) }) return (

{product.name}
{product.rating} from {product.numReviews} reviews

${product.price}

{product.description}

Subtotal

 Qty: Quantity 1 2 3 4 5 Price: ${product.price}
) } /* Subtotal Quantity 1 2 3 4 5 */
